subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Chris Pronger broke a third-period tie with his second goal of the game Tuesday night, and the Anaheim Ducks improved the best start in franchise history by beating the Florida Panthers, 5-4.
snippet: Chris Pronger broke a third-period tie with his second goal of the game Tuesday night, and the Anaheim Ducks improved the best start in franchise history by beating the Florida Panthers, 5-4.
